DOC.brief_summary: In study , effect citrus extract exercise performance investigate . The study consist three group : one group receive high dose citrus extract , one group receive low dose citrus extract last group receive placebo . After four eight week effect performance measure Triple Wingate cycling test , handgrip strength , vertical jump 1600m run trial . It expect exercise performance increase citrus extract group , compare placebo group .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Citrus Extract Exercise Performance Moderately Trained Athletes
